conversation.text: Just the ush. Been reading a lotta manga.
Yeah, I've been fucking around with this slice of life isekai combo shit.

They've all got these super verbose titles like I Can't Leave The Starting Town Until I've Cooked A Five Star Meal For Student Council President?? and Starting My New Life As A Level 32 White Mage With My Awkward Stepsister!
Yeah, I gotta say it's really empowering to just go all in on some real trash media.
